DataElement.preferredName: Perceived Stress Scale Last Month How Often Felt On Top Of Things Score_5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often in the past month he/she felt on top of things, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Perceived Stress Scale Last Month How Often Felt On Top Of Things Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures a person's evaluation of the stressfulness of life situations in the past month. Each item is rated 0-4 on a 5-point Likert scale._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A survey question about the frequency with which a person felt on top of things.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures a person's evaluation of the stressfulness of life situations in the past month. Each item is rated 0-4 on a 5-point Likert scale.

Concepts.definition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures a person's evaluation of the stressfulness of life situations in the past month. Each item is rated 0-4 on a 5-point Likert scale. (Cohen, et al, J Health Soc Behav, 24 (1983))

Property.preferredName: Last Month How Often Felt On Top Of Things Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A survey question about the frequency with which a person felt on top of things.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.longName: How Often Felt on Top of Things in the Last Month
Concepts.definition: A question about the frequency an individual feels or felt on top of things during the last month.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released as part of caDSR clean up. mc 7/12/12

ValueDomain.preferredName: Past Month Frequency Score_5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric code to represent how frequently in the past month a person experienced something using a five-point Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something rarely happens.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something rarely happens.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs relatively frequently.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something occurs relatively frequently.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Modified long name and definition to meet quality criteria prior to release as part of caDSR clean up. mc 7/12/12

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the last month, how often
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Measure Authors
ReferenceDocuments.description: Cohen, S., Kamarck, T., and Mermelstein, R.
